txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken halberds from Orcs and Angmarim in the lands surrounding Aughaire. Deliver the items to Raith at Aughaire in the south-western reaches of Angmar.
'They ruled over our people too long and took everything from us. This will bring hope to many that the oppressive yoke can be cast aside. Thank you.'
'Our oppressors, the Orcs and Men of Angmar, are ever-present around us. Claiming their weapons would improve the morale of our people.'
Council of the North Task: Broken Halberds
The Hillmen at Aughaire have requested a collection of broken halberds to be delivered to Raith.
Deliver the broken halberds to Raith at Aughaire in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver broken halberds from the Orcs and Angmarim surrounding Aughaire to Raith, a Hillman within the settlement.
Wanted: Broken halberds from Orcs and Angmarim in the lands surrounding Aughaire.
